title: Typeface design/typography courses in London
content:
Just wondering if anyone knows of any good typeface design/typography courses in London?

Cheers.
author: i0ta

comments.content:
Check out

[Central St. Martins](http://web.archive.org/web/20060303084014/http:/www.csm.arts.ac.uk/)  
 [London College of Communication](http://web.archive.org/web/20060303084014/http:/www.lcc.arts.ac.uk/), formerly London College of Printing  
 [Royal College of Art](http://web.archive.org/web/20060303084014/http:/www.rca.ac.uk/)

However, if you really want to get serious, you’ll need to get on the fast train to Reading and check out [The University of Reading’s Typography Department](http://web.archive.org/web/20060303084014/http:/www.rdg.ac.uk/AcaDepts/lt/)
Thanks very much Tiffany. I’ll have to look into the Reading course.
